name: Outlook Address Book File
summary: Learn about .OLK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OLK files can be opened manually in Outlook 2003 by typing the following command: Outlook.exe /l olk_filename. OLK files can also be opened by Microsoft Word 2003 and used for mail merge and other document operations.
Outlook contacts are more often stored as Personal Address Book (.PAB) files.

description: Address book created by Microsoft Outlook, an email application; may contain contact information for people and organizations; can store names, phone numbers, addresses, titles, organization data, and other contact information; used for saving and loading contacts.
